https://github.com/hapifhir/org.hl7.fhir.core/issues/583

@Ward Weistra can someone at firely confirm that there's no firewall issues here. I'd be super surprised if there is, but I can't actually say that there isn't
@Grahame Grieve , we have reached out to the reporter of the issue. As far as we can see this is not related to a firewall issue. But we will continue to investigate this.
